name: RollerPlay Demo
detailed_description: Rollerplay is runner with a fun story line for VR and non-VR game play. You guide your athletes on tracks of futuristic rolling driveway transport. Collect gold star credits. Unlock power-ups. No micro-transactions. No pay to win. Skills based scores only.
